story.title: OUR STORY
story.subtitle: Founded in 2017, Zagreb Rugby Ladies emerged from a simple belief.
story.description1: Today, we're proud members of the Croatian Rugby Union, with over 30 active members ranging from complete beginners to experienced athletes and national team players. Our club has become a cornerstone of women's rugby in Croatia.
story.description2: But our greatest achievement isn't our wins on the field—it's the confidence, friendships, and personal growth our players develop.

mission.title: OUR MISSION & VALUES
mission.missionText: To empower girls and young women through rugby, fostering confidence, resilience, and lifelong friendships while promoting the sport we love throughout Croatia and abroad.

inclusion.title: INCLUSION
inclusion.description: Rugby is for everyone. We celebrate diversity in all its forms and create a space where every player feels valued and supported.

resilience.title: RESILIENCE
resilience.description: Rugby teaches us to get back up when we fall. We build mental and physical toughness that serves us on and off the field.

teamwork.title: TEAMWORK
teamwork.description: No one succeeds alone in rugby. We support each other, grow together, and celebrate collective achievements.

courage.title: COURAGE
courage.description: We encourage our players to step outside their comfort zones, take on challenges, and discover what they're truly capable of.

cta.title: READY TO JOIN OUR TEAM?
cta.description: Whether you're a complete beginner or experienced player, we'd love to welcome you to the Zagreb Rugby Ladies family.

story.title: OUR STORY IN PICTURES
story.subtitle: Every training session, match, and celebration tells our story.
story.description1: From intense training sessions to triumphant matches, these moments capture the spirit, dedication, and joy of Zagreb Rugby Ladies.
story.description2: Each photo tells a story of determination, friendship, and the incredible journey of women who dared to step onto the rugby field.

hero.title: RUGBY 7S ESSENTIALS
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started with the world's most exciting rugby format

playersPerTeam.title: 7 Players Per Team
playersPerTeam.description: Just 7 players on a full-size field - that means tons of space to run and score!

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Score more tries than the opposition by carrying, passing, or kicking the ball into the opponent's try zone.

duration.title: 14 Minutes
duration.description: A match consists of two 7-minute halves with a 2-minute break at halftime.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Proper technique and protective gear ensure rugby is safe. The faster pace promotes skillful play over heavy contact.

scoring.label: Points System
scoring.title: How to
scoring.description: Four ways to put points on the board and dominate the game

try.title: Try
try.description: Grounding the ball in the opponent's try zone

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: Kick through the posts after a try

dropGoal.title: Drop Goal
dropGoal.description: Field goal kicked during regular play

positions.label: Team Structure
positions.title: Player
positions.description: Understanding the unique roles that make rugby sevens so dynamic

safety.label: Safety First
safety.title: Safety &
safety.description: Everything you need to play safely and confidently

safetyMeasures.title: Safety Measures
items: Qualified first aid at all sessions

myths.label: Truth Check
myths.title: Myths vs
myths.description: Debunking common misconceptions about rugby sevens

items.myth: Rugby sevens is just sprint rugby
items.reality: While faster, rugby sevens requires strategic thinking, skill, and endurance. The open space creates opportunities for creative play.

items.myth: Only super fit athletes can play
items.reality: Rugby sevens welcomes all fitness levels. The shorter game time and smaller teams mean more opportunities for everyone to contribute.
The simplified format with fewer players makes rugby sevens easier to understand. The action is exciting but the rules remain the same.
Women's rugby sevens is Olympic sport showcasing incredible skill, speed and athleticism. It's one of the most exciting formats to watch and play.

faq.label: Common Questions
faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Everything you wanted to know about getting started

items.question: Is rugby sevens safe for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely! Rugby sevens has strict safety protocols and the faster pace actually promotes skillful play over heavy contact. Our coaches prioritize safety and teach proper technique from day one.

items.question: Do I need to be super fit to play sevens?
items.answer: Rugby sevens welcomes all fitness levels. The 7-minute halves mean everyone gets rest, and there are positions that suit different attributes - from pace to power. Fitness develops naturally through training.

items.question: What equipment do I need?
items.answer: For beginners, just comfortable athletic wear and running shoes or rugby boots. The club provides balls and training equipment. Optional protective gear like mouth guards are available as you progress.

items.question: Can I start playing sevens with no experience?
items.answer: Yes! Many players find sevens easier to learn with fewer players and more space. Our beginner-friendly training sessions teach fundamentals step by step in a supportive environment.

items.question: How is women's sevens different from men's?
items.answer: The rules are identical, and women's sevens is an Olympic sport showcasing incredible skill and athleticism. The game emphasizes speed, strategy, and teamwork with equally competitive and exciting play.

items.question: What's the time commitment?
items.answer: We train three times a week with matches on weekends. Training sessions are 90 minutes. You can attend as many sessions as your schedule allows, and we welcome players who can't make every session.

cta.description: Join Zagreb Rugby Ladies and become part of Croatia's premier women's rugby sevens team

hero.title: PRIVACY POLICY
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

privacy.introduction: At Zagreb Rugby Ladies, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle any personal information you provide to us through our website or contact forms. Zagreb Rugby Ladies is the data controller for the personal information we collect, meaning we are responsible for determining how and why your data is processed.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

items.name: Name (when you contact us through our contact form)
items.phone: Phone number (optional, if you choose to provide it)
items.message: Any other information you choose to provide in your message

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
items.communicate: Communicate with you about Zagreb Rugby Ladies activities, events, and training sessions

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Your data is stored securely and is only accessible to authorized team members who need it to respond to your inquiries. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdPartyServices.description: To process contact form submissions, we use Basin (usebasin.com), a secure form handling service. When you submit our contact form, your information is transmitted to Basin's servers and then forwarded directly to us. Basin temporarily stores copies of submissions on their servers for form processing purposes. Basin acts as a data processor under our instruction and is committed to data protection standards. For more information about Basin's privacy practices, please visit their privacy policy.
thirdPartyServices.dataController: Zagreb Rugby Ladies remains the data controller for all information you submit through our contact form. The data goes directly to us, and we control how it is used and stored.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy:

items.inquiries: Contact form submissions are retained for up to 2 years to respond to your inquiry and maintain communication records
items.deleteRequest: You may request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us
items.automatic: After the retention period expires, your data will be securely deleted unless there is a legal requirement to retain it longer

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR Compliance)
rights.description: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to:

items.access: Access the personal data we hold about you
items.rectification: Request correction of any inaccurate data
items.erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: Object to the processing of your data
items.portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: Our website does not use cookies or tracking technologies to collect personal information. We may use basic analytics to understand how visitors use our site, but this does not identify individual users.

contact.title: Contact Us About Privacy
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, please contact us at:

hero.title: TERMS OF USE
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our website.

terms.introduction: Welcome to the Zagreb Rugby Ladies website. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.

copyright.title: Intellectual Property & Copyright
copyright.description: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, photographs, graphics, logos, and website design, is the property of Zagreb Rugby Ladies and is protected by Croatian and international copyright laws. This includes:

items.photos: All photographs of players, matches, and team events
items.design: Website design, layout, and visual elements
items.logos: Zagreb Rugby Ladies logos and branding

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: When using our website, you agree to the following terms:

items.view: View and browse the website for personal, non-commercial use
items.share: Share links to our website on social media
items.contact: Use our contact form to inquire about joining the team

items.copy: Download, copy, or reproduce photographs without explicit written permission
items.modify: Modify, alter, or create derivative works from our website design or content
items.commercial: Use any content for commercial purposes without authorization
items.scrape: Use automated tools to extract or scrape data from our website

photos.title: Photography and Images
photos.description: All photographs on this website are owned by Zagreb Rugby Ladies or used with permission. Unauthorized downloading, copying, or use of these images is strictly prohibited. If you wish to use any photographs, please contact us for permission at zrkzagreb@zagreb-rugby.hr.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: While we strive to keep the information on our website accurate and up-to-date, we make no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of the content. Zagreb Rugby Ladies reserves the right to modify or remove any content at any time without notice.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to update these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this page. Your continued use of the website after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Questions About Terms
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use or wish to request permission to use any content, please contact us at:
